properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters from Stonington, ME to Port Clyde, ME out 25 NM; Coastal Waters from Port Clyde, ME to Cape Elizabeth, ME out 25 NM; Coastal Waters from Cape Elizabeth, ME to Merrimack River, MA out 25 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 9 at 9:43AM EST until January 9 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt
expected.

* WHERE...Coastal waters from Merrimack River, MA to Stonington,
ME out to 25 NM.

* WHEN...Until 2 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds, cool sea surface
temperatures, and a much cooler air mass may lead to light
freezing spray during this time as well.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
